Package com.linecorp.armeria.common.tracing

Class RequestContextCurrentTraceContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • brave.propagation.CurrentTraceContext
      • com.linecorp.armeria.common.tracing.RequestContextCurrentTraceContext
  • public final class RequestContextCurrentTraceContext
extends CurrentTraceContext
    Tracing context implemented with RequestContext.

    This CurrentTraceContext stores/loads the trace context into/from a RequestContext's attribute so that there's no need for thread local variables which can lead to unpredictable behavior in asynchronous programming.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class brave.propagation.CurrentTraceContext

    • Field Detail

      • DEFAULT

        public static final CurrentTraceContext DEFAULT
        Use this singleton when building a Tracing instance for use with HttpTracingService or HttpTracingClient.

        If you need to customize the context, use newBuilder() instead.

        See Also:
        Tracing.Builder.currentTraceContext(brave.propagation.CurrentTraceContext)

      • INSTANCE

        @Deprecated
public static final CurrentTraceContext INSTANCE
        Deprecated.
        Please use DEFAULT or newBuilder() to customize an instance.
        Singleton retained for backwards compatibility, but replaced by DEFAULT.

    • Method Detail

      • newBuilder

        public static CurrentTraceContext.Builder newBuilder()
        Use this when you need customizations such as log integration via CurrentTraceContext.Builder.addScopeDecorator(ScopeDecorator).
        See Also:
        Tracing.Builder.currentTraceContext(brave.propagation.CurrentTraceContext)

      • ensureScopeUsesRequestContext

        public static void ensureScopeUsesRequestContext​(Tracing tracing)
        Ensures the specified Tracing uses a RequestContextCurrentTraceContext.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if tracing does not use RequestContextCurrentTraceContext

      • copy

        public static void copy​(RequestContext src,
                        RequestContext dst)
        Use this to ensure the trace context propagates to children.

        Ex. 

        
  // Ensure the trace context propagates to children
 ctx.onChild(RequestContextCurrentTraceContext::copy);
